assessment_item.title: BV85CC-Q4-Two vibrating strings of the same material but lengths L and 4L have radii 2r and r respectively.They are stretched under the same tension. Both the strings vibrate in their fundamental modes, one of the length L with frequency V_1   and the other with frequency V_2. The ratio    \\frac{v_1}{v_2}is given by
